item.title: Syncing a git branch between Windows and WSL filesystems
item.description: In this post I show how you can work on a git branch with a repository checked out in Windows, and then sync that to another git folder in WSL Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/working-on-a-git-branch-in-two-different-folders-concurrently/
